item.title: 市场为特朗普做准备，石油有望实现四周连涨
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的第二个任期到来之前，石油将迎来第四次周线上涨，交易商们正在寻求影响深远的制裁和贸易政策的明朗化。【原文：Oil headed for a fourth weekly gain ahead of President-elect Donald Trump’s second term, with traders seeking clarity on far-reaching sanctions and trade policies.】

item.title: 拜登顾问警告特朗普若插手美联储将面临通胀风险
item.description: 乔-拜登总统的一位高级经济顾问警告说，唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府如果干预美联储的利率决策，就有可能重新引发通货膨胀。【原文：A top economic adviser to President Joe Biden warned that Donald Trump’s incoming administration risks reigniting inflation if it interferes with the Federal Reserve’s policymaking on interest rates.】

item.title: 报道嘉能可交易谈判后力拓股价下跌
item.description: 据彭博新闻社早些时候报道，全球第二大矿业公司力拓集团与嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）就交易进行了早期谈判，此后力拓集团股价在悉尼下跌达 1.8%。【原文：Rio Tinto Group shares fell as much as 1.8% in Sydney after Bloomberg News earlier reported the world’s second-biggest miner held early-stage talks with Glencore Plc about a deal.】

item.title: 索尼又取消两个 PlayStation 项目
item.description:
公司告诉 Bend 和 Bluepoint 子公司，公司将与它们合作确定下一步措施，并最大限度地减少失业

。【原文：

The company told subsidiaries Bend and Bluepoint it will work with them to determine their next steps and minimize job losses

】

item.title: 中国黑客在美国财政部入侵事件中访问了耶伦的电脑
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士称，美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦的电脑被入侵，非机密文件被调阅，这是中国国家支持的黑客入侵美国财政部的广泛事件的一部分。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen’s computer was infiltrated and unclassified files were accessed as part of a broader breach of the agency by Chinese state-sponsored hackers, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国向特朗普摊牌，人民币和股市受到威胁
item.description: 对于中国的投资者来说，再次与美国打贸易战，除了 "过来人 "的感觉外，没有任何其他感觉。【原文：For investors in China, fighting another trade war with the US will feel like anything but been there and done that.】

item.title: 中国数据公布前，亚洲股市开局疲软：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市难以获得牵引力之后，亚洲股市似乎将下滑，因为交易员们正在为定于周五公布的包括第四季度经济增长在内的一系列中国数据做准备。【原文：Asian stocks look set to slip after US shares struggled to gain traction as traders prepared for a swath of Chinese data scheduled for release Friday including fourth quarter growth.】

item.title: 卡尼离开布鲁克菲尔德参政，弗拉特被任命为主席
item.description: 前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）在参加了领导加拿大自由党的竞选活动后，辞去了布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）董事长一职。【原文：Former central banker Mark Carney stepped down as chairman of Brookfield Asset Management after joining the campaign to lead the Liberal Party of Canada.】

item.title: 亚洲各国央行出人意料的举措显示了美元狂飙的影响
item.description: 印尼意外降息以及印度储备银行放松对卢比控制的迹象表明，各国央行抵御强势美元的防线开始崩溃。【原文：A surprise interest-rate cut in Indonesia and signs the Reserve Bank of India is loosening its tight grip on the rupee suggest central banks’ defense against a strong dollar is starting to crack.】

item.title: 全球人工智能军备竞赛取决于数据中心的使用权
item.description:
美国和英国正在推动扩大人工智能基础设施。【原文：

The US and UK are pushing to expand infrastructure for artificial intelligence.

】

item.title: 超过 70% 的日本央行观察家预计下周加息
item.description: 根据彭博社的最新调查，近四分之三的日本央行观察家预测下周将加息，这反映了在日本央行行长上田一夫表示其董事会将讨论加息后，市场对加息的预期有所上升。【原文：Almost three quarters of Bank of Japan watchers predict an interest rate hike next week according to the latest Bloomberg survey, reflecting a jump in expectations after Governor Kazuo Ueda said his board will be discussing the move.】

item.title: 乐天的 Mikitani 希望向日本投资者出售债券
item.description: 亿万富翁三木谷浩史（Hiroshi Mikitani）表示，他的乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Billionaire Hiroshi Mikitani said that his Rakuten Group Inc. is keen to sell more bonds to Japanese investors to help diversify funding that has been focused on overseas debt markets.】

item.title: 阿根廷央行采取措施实现美元化并维持利率不变
item.description: 阿根廷央行表示，支付中介机构必须在 2 月 28 日之前启用美元借记卡交易，这是哈维尔-米莱伊总统承诺实现经济美元化的关键一步。【原文：Argentina’s central bank said payment intermediaries will have to enable debit card transactions in US currency by Feb. 28, marking a key step in President Javier Milei’s pledge to dollarize the economy.】

item.title: 施罗德将裁员 3% 以求恢复增长
item.description: 施罗德集团（Schroders Plc）计划裁员 3%，新任首席执行官理查德-奥德菲尔德（Richard Oldfield）希望重振这家英国最大的独立资产管理公司。【原文：Schroders Plc plans to cut as much as 3% of its workforce, as new Chief Executive Officer Richard Oldfield looks to revive the UK’s largest standalone asset manager.】

item.title: 与许多同行不同，英伟达首席执行官将缺席特朗普就职典礼
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.公司首席执行官黄仁勋预计将缺席 1 月 20 日当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼，这与美国高知名度科技领袖的趋势背道而驰。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang is expected to miss the inauguration of President-elect Donald Trump on Jan. 20, bucking a trend among high-profile US technology leaders.】

item.title: 纽约市通勤者有了躲避交通堵塞的新方法：95 美元乘坐直升机
item.description: 居住在纽约市郊区的富裕工人们很快就会有一条避免前往曼哈顿办公室途中交通堵塞的捷径。【原文：Well-heeled workers that live in the New York City suburbs will soon have a lofty path to avoiding gridlock en route to their Manhattan offices.】

item.title: 2025 年交易所交易基金的五大预测
item.description:
ETF Store 总裁内特-杰拉西（Nate Geraci）参加了本期Trillions节目，讨论他眼中的新一年。【原文：

ETF Store President Nate Geraci joins this episode of Trillions to discuss what he sees coming in the new year.

】

item.title: 微软将消费者 Office 订阅费提高 30% 至每年 130 美元
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）正在提高其面向消费者的 Office 应用程序包的价格，赌用户会愿意为使用新的人工智能工具支付更多费用。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is raising the price of its package of Office apps for consumers, a bet that subscribers will be willing to cough up more for access to new artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 卡尼在家乡开始竞选加拿大领导人，攻击不断升级
item.description: 前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）将于本周四正式开始角逐接替贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）担任加拿大自由党党魁和总理的职位，反对党领袖已经开始抨击他的政绩。【原文：Former central banker Mark Carney is due to formally kick off his bid to replace Justin Trudeau as the head of Canada’s Liberal Party and the country’s prime minister on Thursday, with the leader of the opposition already attacking his record.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会就《源氏物语》中的 "礼盒 "达成和解
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国联邦贸易委员会正准备与热门视频游戏《源氏冲击》背后的公司达成和解，因为人们担心该游戏的赚钱机制具有欺骗性。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is preparing to settle with the company behind the popular video game Genshin Impact over concerns that the money-making mechanics of the game were deceptive, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 联邦调查局警告特工称黑客窃取了他们的通话记录
item.description: 彭博新闻社查阅的一份文件显示，联邦调查局领导人警告说，他们认为去年入侵 AT&T 公司系统的黑客窃取了其特工数月的通话和短信记录，从而引发了该局内部保护秘密线人身份的竞赛。【原文：FBI leaders have warned that they believe hackers who broke into AT&T Inc.’s system last year stole months of their agents’ call and text logs, setting off a race within the bureau to protect the identities of confidential informants, a document reviewed by Bloomberg News shows.】

item.title: 力拓与嘉能可讨论潜在合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团和嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）一直在讨论合并业务的问题，这可能会成为该行业有史以来最大的一笔交易，并有可能重塑全球采矿业的格局。【原文：Rio Tinto Group and Glencore Plc have been discussing combining their businesses, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could result in the industry’s largest-ever deal and have the potential to reshape the global mining landscape.】

item.title: 文件显示：雪佛龙不顾制裁在委内瑞拉纳税
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）去年向委内瑞拉政府提交了价值约 3 亿美元的纳税申报单，这引发了人们的疑问：尽管受到制裁，尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统仍从这家美国公司的石油生产中获益多少。【原文：Chevron Corp. filed tax returns worth about $300 million with the Venezuelan government last year, raising questions about how much President Nicolás Maduro is benefiting from the US company’s oil production in spite of sanctions.】

item.title: 法律人工智能初创公司哈维估值将翻番至 30 亿美元
item.description:
Sequoia Capital 正在洽谈领投 3 亿美元的新一轮融资。【原文：

Sequoia Capital is in talks to lead $300 million round. 

】

item.title: 特朗普财政部长人选称中国经济陷入衰退
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的财政部长人选斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）形容世界第二大经济体正处于经济衰退，甚至是萧条之中。【原文：Scott Bessent, President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee for Treasury Secretary, described the world’s No. 2 economy as being in a recession, if not a depression.】

item.title: 任天堂的 Switch 2 来了。现在，一切都与游戏有关。
item.description:
马里奥制造商的新游戏机终于曝光了。但接下来的工作至关重要。【原文：

The Mario maker’s new console has been revealed at last. But what comes next is crucial.

】

item.title: 世界银行警告发展中经济体面临挑战
item.description: 世界银行警告说，发展中经济体未来几年将面临更严峻的形势，全球经济增长过于缓慢，无法提高生活水平，政策的高度不确定性阻碍了先进国家对较贫穷国家的投资。【原文：The World Bank warned that developing economies will face tougher years ahead, with growth globally too slow to boost living standards and a climate of high policy uncertainty deterring advanced-nation investment in poorer countries.】

item.title: 特朗普任命普尔特为联邦住房金融局局长
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普已提名住宅建筑业后裔、网络名人比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）担任联邦住房金融局主任。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Bill Pulte, the homebuilding scion and online personality, to serve as director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency.】

item.title: XRP 大军 "让加密货币第三大代币创下历史新高
item.description: 多年来，XRP 一直是与美国证券交易委员会冲突的中心，而今年到目前为止，XRP 是所有主要加密货币中涨幅最大的。【原文：After being at the center of a conflict with the US Securities and Exchange Commission for years, XRP now has the largest gains of any major cryptocurrency so far this year.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将在数月内结束量化紧缩政策
item.description: 加拿大央行表示，计划在今年上半年停止缩减资产负债表，这使其成为首批发出即将结束量化紧缩计划信号的主要央行之一。【原文：The Bank of Canada says it plans to stop shrinking its balance sheet in the first half of this year, making it one of the first major central banks to signal an imminent end to its quantitative tightening program.】
